  57. class Event(models.Model):
  58. """
  59. An event is something that happens on a specific start date.
  61. For translateable fields see ``EventTitle``.
  63. :start_date: The DateTime when this event starts.
  64. :is_published: If ``True``, the event would be returned by the
  65. ``get_events`` templatetag.
  66. :creation_date: The DateTime when this event was created.
  67. :user: The user who created this event.
  69. """
  71. placeholders = M2MPlaceholderField(
  72. actions=SimpleTranslationPlaceholderActions(),
  73. placeholders=('content', ),
  74. )

  160. def get_address(self):
  161. """Returns the address with country."""
  162. trans = self.get_translation()
  163. full_address = u''
  164. if trans.venue_name:
  165. full_address += u'{0}<br />'.format(trans.venue_name)
  166. if trans.address_1:
  167. full_address += u'{0}<br />'.format(trans.address_1)
  168. if trans.address_2:
  169. full_address += u'{0}<br />'.format(trans.address_2)
  170. if trans.city:
  171. if trans.postal_code:
  172. full_address += u'{0} '.format(trans.postal_code)
  173. full_address += u'{0}<br />'.format(trans.city)
  174. full_address += u'{0}'.format(self.country.name.encode())
  175. return full_address
  177. def get_alternative_events(self):
  178. return Event.objects.filter(category=self.category).exclude(
  179. pk=self.pk).order_by('start_date')
  181. def get_city_and_country(self):
  182. trans = self.get_translation()
  183. result = u''
  184. if trans.city:
  185. result += u'{0}, '.format(trans.city)
  186. result += self.country.name.encode()
  187. return result
  189. def get_number_of_days(self):
  190. """Returns the number of days for this event."""
  191. if not self.end_date:
  192. return 1
  193. amount = self.end_date - self.start_date
  194. return amount.days + 1
  196. def get_title(self):
  197. lang = get_language()
  198. return get_preferred_translation_from_lang(self, lang).title
  200. def get_translation(self):
  201. lang = get_language()
  202. return get_preferred_translation_from_lang(self, lang)

  260. def get_absolute_url(self):
  261. middleware = (
  262. 'simple_translation.middleware.MultilingualGenericsMiddleware')
  263. language_namespace = middleware in settings.MIDDLEWARE_CLASSES \
  264. and '%s:' % self.language or ''
  265. return reverse(
  266. '%ssimple_events_detail' % language_namespace,
  267. args=(),
  268. kwargs={'pk': self.event.pk, }
  269. )
